3120/A0/04/800/003.indicator_name: Staff Development Plan approved and implemented  in its 3 levels.

3120/A0/04/800/003.status_value: Completed. UNICEF staff members actively participated in the UN Cares Committee  acting as the Vice-Chair  two internal workshops were conducted this year  as per the staff development plan. Furthermore  the office organized a UNICEF stand for the UN system fair on HIV/AIDS that was well commended.
3120/A0/04/800/003.indicator_name: Minimum standards on HIV and AIDS in the workplace met.

3120/A0/04/800/003.status_value: Completed. The office submitted the CPMP for the 2013-2017 cooperation cycle in May of this year. The HR structure designed to meet the new programme needs includes abolishment of 4 FT positions and the discontinuation of 5 additional TA positions.
3120/A0/04/800/003.indicator_name: Staff Structure reflecting the priorities of the CPMP to be approved completed.

3120/A0/04/800/002.status_value: Completed. Some issues with travel authorizations and DCT still remained  but the system is fully operational and the staff is adequately trained.
3120/A0/04/800/002.indicator_name: VISION fully implemented as the new CO ERP  ensuring that all concerned staff is fully trained to perform successfully.

3120/A0/04/800/002.status_value: Completed. The document was developed in full consultation with all the CO staff and submitted on due time.
3120/A0/04/800/002.indicator_name: Country Programme Management Plan prepared over the basis of the Country Programme Document to be submitted to the PBR completed. The CPMP must develop the new Staff Structure  budget and the proposal on the implementation management.

3120/A0/04/800/002.status_value: Completed. SOPs for the main 7 processes in the office were developed by a team including staff from Programme and Operations section. The documents include checklists/tracking sheets and flowcharts for each process.
3120/A0/04/800/002.indicator_name: Updated set of Standard Operational Procedures adapted to the new VISION framework developed and approved by the CMT.

3120/A0/04/800/002.status_value: Completed. Audits of the 13 main implementaing partners were completed this year. The audit reports include rich information aimed at strengthening partners capacity which was shared within the office and with the partners themselves.
3120/A0/04/800/002.indicator_name: Audits on the main implementing partners according to the HACT Assurance Activities Plan implemented and shared with involved institutions and concerned staff members.

3120/A0/04/800/002.status_value: Completed. The 3 main proposals approved by the CMT aimed at savings by the amount of US$ 62 000 per year.
